基本信息.Message: Make sure using this hardcoded IP address "2.8.11.2" is safe here.

回答情况.理由: Hardcoding IP addresses in code is generally not considered a good practice because it makes the application less flexible and more prone to security risks. If the IP address '2.8.11.2' is hardcoded in the code, it means that the application will always use this specific IP address, which can cause issues if there are changes in the network infrastructure or if the application needs to be deployed to a different environment. Additionally, if the IP address is exposed to external sources or becomes publicly known, it could pose a security risk, as attackers could use it to target the application or gain unauthorized access.
